metadata.title: CVE-2020-12465 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An array overflow was discovered in mt76_add_fragment indrivers/net/wireless/mediatek/mt76/dma.c in the Linux kernel before 5.5.10,aka CID-b102f0c522cf. An oversized packet with too many rx fragments cancorrupt memory of adjacent pages.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12465` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-21-generic - 5.4.0-21.25
linux-image-5.4.0-21-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-21.25
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-21-generic - 5.4.0-21.25
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-21-lowlatency - 5.4.0-21.25
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-1006-kvm - 5.4.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-1007-aws - 5.4.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1008-azure - 5.4.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1007-gcp - 5.4.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1007-oracle - 5.4.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.6.0-1007-oem - 5.6.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-1007-raspi - 5.4.0-1007.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-21.25').
linux-kvm package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1006.6').
linux-aws package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1007.7').
linux-azure package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1008.8').
linux-gcp package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1007.7').
linux-oracle package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1007.7').
linux-raspi2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life, was needs-triage').
linux-oem-5.6 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.6.0-1007.7').
linux-raspi package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1007.7').
